thread.title: 3M Agrees to Pay $850 Million to Settle Minnesota Water Contamination Lawsuit

author: Andrew Tangel
title: 3M Agrees to Pay $850 Million to Settle Minnesota Water Contamination Lawsuit

organizations.name: settle minnesota water contamination lawsuit 3m co.

text:
3M Co. will pay $850 million to settle Minnesota’s lawsuit, claiming the manufacturer contaminated water in the state for at least five decades.
The deal reached by the company and state’s attorney general was announced hours after a trial over the suit was slated to begin Tuesday.
Minnesota Attorney General Lori Swanson had accused 3M of... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
